thread.title: Looking for holiday romance? Head to Seattle for the best-looking men, claims new study
thread.title_full: Looking for holiday romance? Head to Seattle for the best-looking men, claims new study | Daily Mail Online

author: Katie Amey for MailOnline
title: Looking for holiday romance? Head to Seattle for the best-looking men, claims new study
text:
2
View
comments
If you're single and looking for love on a US vacation, it's Seattle you need to head to, according to a new study.
The rainy West Coast city is known for its flannel-wearing fellows, who also happen to be the most well-groomed in America, it claims.
The conclusion was reached using some clever mathematics.
According to a new survey on male grooming habits, the bet-looking American men can be found in Seattle
Website GroomingLounge.com using an algorithm that analysed the amount spent on personal care products and services, among other things.
It also took into account the amount spent on clothes, reported Yahoo Travel .
 Caught on camera: The incredible moment a small airplane... How global warming is delaying flights: Planes are in the... The mystery of India's 'floating' palace: Former royal haunt... How dangerous ARE bird strikes? The experts' guide to what... San Francisco came a close second, while Washington DC rounded out the top three.
The study took into consideration the amount spent on personal care and services, among other things
THE TOP 10 US CITIES FOR HANDSOME MEN 1. Seattle, WA
2. San Francisco, CA
3. Washington, DC
4. Boston, MA
5. Denver, CO
6. New York, NY
7. Austin, TX
8. Nashville, TN
9. Atlanta, GA
10. Minneapolis, MN
Boston, Massachusetts and Denver, Colorado, were also in the top five.
New York City was listed in sixth place, while Austin, Texas, followed in seventh.
One of the country's largest cities, Chicago, was ranked 12th, while Los Angeles men could be found at a distant 16th.
'We are in the business of making men more handsome and as we expand and look for franchise partners, it's important for us to know which cities will be most receptive to our mission,' said Grooming Lounge Founder and CEO Mike Gilman.
However, if it's simply a stunning country you want to visit, try Ethiopia.
It was recently named as the World's Best Tourism Destination for 2015.
It was given the award by the the European Council on Tourism and Trade, who praised its outstanding natural beauty, dramatic landscapes and ancient culture.
Thirty-one countries were considered for the illustrious award this year, with Ethiopia coming top of the pile.
